sentence.Network_en: Chris is so ambitious, so determined to do it all.
sentence.Network_cn: 克里斯踌躇满志，决心要将它都做完。

sentence.Network_en: This is an ambitious and intriguing movie, full of striking imagery.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一部气势恢宏、引人入胜的电影，充满了动人心魄的瑰丽意象。

sentence.Network_en: The plan may well be over-ambitious, and is clearly open to discussion.
sentence.Network_cn: 该计划可能太过好高骛远，势必要招致争论。

新概念英语单词大全_百度文库 ... ambition n. 抱负 ambitious a. 野心勃勃的 amount n. 数额.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French ambitieux or Latin ambitiosus, from ambitio (see ambition)

entry.tran: 有雄心的；有抱负的；有野心的
entry.def: Someone who is ambitious has a strong desire to be successful, rich, or powerful.

example.ex: Chris is so ambitious, so determined to do it all...
example.tran: 克里斯踌躇满志，决心要将它都做完。

example.ex: He's a very ambitious lad and he wants to play at the highest level.
example.tran: 他是个很有抱负的小伙子，想参加最高水平的比赛。

entry.def: An ambitious idea or plan is on a large scale and needs a lot of work to be carried out successfully.

example.ex: The ambitious project was completed in only nine months...
example.tran: 这个规模宏大的项目只用了9个月就完成了。

means.word_mean: 1. having a strong desire for success or achievement
2. requiring full use of your abilities or resources;

sentences.sentence: "performed the most challenging task without a mistake"

auth_sentence.content: We are well equipped and the club is ambitious.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are well equipped and the club is ambitious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are well equipped and the club is ambitious.

auth_sentence.content: He was ambitious in life and loved to party.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was ambitious in life and loved to party.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was ambitious in life and loved to party.

auth_sentence.content: The government's new mortgage guarantee scheme is ambitious.
auth_sentence.res_content: The government's new mortgage guarantee scheme is ambitious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The government's new mortgage guarantee scheme is ambitious.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有抱负的,雄心勃勃的;有野心的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ambition怠鷄dj.有抱负的,雄心勃勃的;有野心的
in进+it行走+iative=ive……的→走进的→开始的
itiner=it变体+ant……的→走的→走来走去的
sed=se分开+it走+ious……的→分开走的→煽动叛乱的
trans变换+it走+ory……的→你走他来→短暂的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 对[成功,权力等]的强烈欲望,野心;雄心
stems_affixes.word_buile: amb大+it行走+ion表名词→走大步,雄心
in进+it行走+iative=ive……的→走进的→开始的
itiner=it变体+ary表名词→n.行程表,旅行路线
sed=se分开+it走+ion表名词→分开走→煽动叛乱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通过,通行,中转,输送,运送
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans变换+it行走→n.通过,通行,中转,输送,运送
trans变换+it行走+ion表名词→交接过程[it可以理解为走的过程]→过渡

stems_affixes.value_cn: 开始,创始,发动;启蒙,使入门;引入
stems_affixes.word_buile: in进+it行走+iate表动词→走进→开始

Sentence.sentence: If he has ambitious goals and is willing to put in long hours, everyone in his unit will follow his example.
The Swedes can certainly take a lesson from the United States and look for ways to clear a path for their ambitious female careerists.

means.word_mean: 有抱负的, 雄心勃勃的

sentences.en: Only ambitious students get the best marks.
sentences.cn: 有抱负的学生才能取得最好的成绩。
年轻人, 要胸怀大志。

sentences.en: The actress is ambitious of applause.
sentences.cn: 这女演员极想得到喝彩。

jushi.english: We are looking for an ambitious young assistant.
jushi.chinese: 我们正在找一名雄心壮志的青年助手。

jushi.english: The government has announced an ambitious programme to modernize the railway network.
jushi.chinese: 政府宣布了一项高要求的计划，使铁路网现代化。

jushi.english: This is an ambitious piece of work.
